p:
Weekly time trends showed that influenza A(H1N1) pdm09 activity takes place in Saudi Arabia between week 42 of one year and week 11 of the next Gregorian year (
Figures 2
and
3 ). The highest number of confirmed cases (1080, 6.3%) were reported in epidemio-logical week 46 of the year 2015. This was followed by week 48 of the same year (1052, 6.1%). Less than 100 cases per week were reported between week 12 and 39 (
Figure 3 ).
